about_the_game:
Stay with me! is a narrative psychological horror game. Experience firsthand the damage fear can do to your mind by losing yourself alone in a series of unexplained events. As a player we embody Ana who travels on her way to her house, however she ends up getting lost on the way to experience a series of strange events that will trigger contact with aliens.

On November 1999, a young woman named Ana got lost near a mountain forest. Her whereabouts are unknown to this day. The police searched for her for many years indicating that she may have suffered an accident, likewise other indications indicate that she was murdered and that her body was hidden in the forest. However, locals speculate that her disappearance may be related to strange lights seen in the forest and in the night sky.

Assumes the role of Ana to discover her whereabouts.

content_descriptors.notes:
Strong lighting effects
Subjective violence
Moderate physical violence
Abduction

detailed_description:
Stay with me! is a narrative psychological horror game. Experience firsthand the damage fear can do to your mind by losing yourself alone in a series of unexplained events. As a player we embody Ana who travels on her way to her house, however she ends up getting lost on the way to experience a series of strange events that will trigger contact with aliens.

On November 1999, a young woman named Ana got lost near a mountain forest. Her whereabouts are unknown to this day. The police searched for her for many years indicating that she may have suffered an accident, likewise other indications indicate that she was murdered and that her body was hidden in the forest. However, locals speculate that her disappearance may be related to strange lights seen in the forest and in the night sky.

Assumes the role of Ana to discover her whereabouts.

fullgame.name: Stay with Me! Alien Abduction Story

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS High Sierra 10.13.6
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2.50GHz
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Graphics

name: Stay With Me! Alien Abduction Story Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460, 2.70GHz or AMD FX™-6300 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 3770 3.4GHz or AMD equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 with 3GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Psychological Horror game, seek how to survive this strange encounter with beings from another world
